name: N-1 - OpCSS
description:
Estilo limpio, sencillo y m√°s usable para la red N-1 basada en elgg.
Clean, minimal and more usable style of elgg based N-1 network.
additional_info:
1.8 - hover on all image links, better calendar colors and some css3 effects on image galleries
1.7 - Align the content text of groups. (The left image was too wide)
1.6 - Font "lighter" discarded. Too light in mac. Replaced by 400 normal.
1.5 - Some things fixed, rounded images, dotted borders, important red buttons, top menu...
1.0 - Still lots of things to do!
